Name: Expert Overwatch
Description: The [name] is a masterful gunner, granting the following benefits:

ListedItems.Description: When Overwatch's area is created, the [name] can deal 2 piercing damage to all foes inside as an area effect.
Any foe entering or exiting Overwatch's area takes 2 piercing damage from the [name], but no more than once a turn.

Name: Imperial Command Aura
Description: Aura 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 boon on attacks.

Name: Orders
Description: At the start of the round, give an orders token to any imperial character. That character automatically activates any exceed effects of their attacks, deals bonus damage, and gains +1 action, but can only take their turn after all other imperials have acted. At the end of the round, discard that token.

Name: Promotion
Description: Starts combat with vigor equal to their VIT.
